gameDetails.name: Agricola: Gamers' Deck
gameDetails.description:
The Agricola: Gamers' Deck is a medium-sized expansion that includes 59 minor improvement cards and 60 occupation cards. The deck is playable alone but it is best when mixed with EIK.  The cards were developed and tested by users of Play-Agricola (aka Lookout Games' online test group) to fill in gaps in game play that had developed since Agricola first released.

It was designed for use only with the base game. It has enough cards to play with 5 players.

The artwork on the cards is entirely 100% drawn by the original Agricola/Le Havre artist.
